alert.note: Alert for Gila (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 28 at 4:39AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 1030 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flow in Tonto Creek has increased above Action Stage which will make unbridged crossings unsafe to cross. * WHERE...A portion of east central Arizona, including the following county, Gila. * WHEN...Until 1030 AM MST. * IMPACTS...Unbridged crossings in Punkin Center and Tonto Basin are expected to be or become impassable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 431 AM MST, the streamflow gauge on Tonto Creek at Roosevelt, upstream from Tonto Basin, reported flow above action stage at 4.59 feet. Flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in Tonto Creek affecting the low water crossings of A Crossing, Bar X Crossing, and Store Crossing. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Tonto Basin. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
